item.title: Covid 19 Update
item.description: Analysis of mortality rates based on several input variables The rampant Covid-19 virus has mankind firmly in its grip. And even though many have gotten used to this state of helplessness in the meantime, that was quite different in the beginning. Especially the months of March and April were characterized by panic and uncertainty. It was said to be a killer virus - a mixture of misinformation and sheer ignorance.
